body_html:
I'd like to see this addressed too, my vim goes all red when I open TF code. Either adding a decent flake8 config (like in #4511 (comment)) and vim header or fixing the 2 space thing would be fine with me.

For the time being, I'm just putting a .flake8 file in my local tree, that solves everything being red and I still have some descent linting. Not sure about the vim-config, anyone know how to configure vim to have project based overrides? For example to use the config suggested above, but only when starting vim in a specific directory or set of files?

Also, you should check out: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wf-BqAjZb8M (just auto-pepping the entire code-base is not a solution)
